definition: bad/ill/not good at/not to be pooh-poohed/quite impressive
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect
He who comes is surely ill-intentioned, no-one well-meaning will come (idiom)./Be careful not to trust foreigners./Beware of Greeks bearing gifts!
pinyin: lai2 zhe3 bu4 shan4 , shan4 zhe3 bu4 lai2

sentences.english: We may call this phenomenon catching the lion by its tail, and it is an unskillful thing to do.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以称之为抓住狮子的尾巴，这是不善巧的。

sentences.english: Money can be good or bad, but prajna is always good.
sentences.chinese: 财富有善有恶，般若则无有不善。

sentences.english: Through bad operation, the company had a slump in profits.
sentences.chinese: 由于经营不善，公司利润骤降。

sentences.english: I'm no orator , as he is.
sentences.chinese: 我不善言语，而他却是位雄辩家。

sentences.english: The barrenness of their effort is due to poor management.
sentences.chinese: 他们努力的徒劳无益归咎于管理不善。

sentences.english: When they recognize good as good, it is not good.
sentences.chinese: 皆知善之为善，斯不善已。

sentences.english: Fourth, German attitudes soured on European integration.
sentences.chinese: 第四，德国对欧洲整合的态度不善。

sentences.english: The boy is not good at figures.
I pristine father and brother, always ineloquent.
sentences.chinese: 我质朴的父兄，向来不善言辞。

sentences.english: The bank manages the case that not to be pooh- poohed closes down and cannot pay, also can happen.
sentences.chinese: 银行经营不善倒闭而不能支付的情况，也会发生的。

sentences.english: The board has so misconducted the affairs of the company that it's deep in debt.
sentences.chinese: 由于董事会对公司管理不善，公司负债累累。

sentences.english: Because of the company's poor management, it cannot pay the employees' wages.
sentences.chinese: 由于公司经营不善，上个月已经开始停发职工工资了。

sentences.english: This time, always ineloquent of John Woo, but very embarrassed.
sentences.chinese: 这下，素来不善言辞的吴宇森可是相当不好意思。

sentences.english: It is not good to be partial to the wicked or to deprive the innocent of justice.
sentences.chinese: 瞻徇恶人的情面，偏断义人的案件，都为不善。

sentences.english: China is a different story, but might not interfere unless the U. S. gets actively involved.
sentences.chinese: 中国来者不善，但也许不会卷入，除非美国积极涉入。

definition: unhappy/in low spirits/(of a knife) not sharp
to harbor evil designs/to harbor malicious intentions
lacking in confidence/diffident/to have a guilty conscience
